channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
channel.desc: A special edition of this series on COP30 describes the threats facing the Amazon rainforest. We see the potential of agroforestry, and discover Japanese technologies aiding farmers' incomes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Let's Enjoy Math With Barky The Dog
channel.desc: Numbler hides the measuring stick at a shoe shop so that a customer's foot cannot be measured. Barky realizes that the measurement can be made by counting how many 1-centimeter items are needed, and the customer's foot is measured successfully.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Take Tech
channel.desc: Hair dryers are handy for drying hair in a jiffy. But how do they blow warm air? This episode examines the mechanism step by step.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan
channel.desc: Our cyclist climbs the Kii Mountains in western Japan, and encounters the culture that developed on the secluded slopes. Artisans work with rare black bamboo, and make pigment using an old method.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Wind Of Change In Japan: The Deaflympics' Hope For Inclusivity
channel.desc: In November 2025, the Summer Deaflympic Games will be held in Tokyo. We meet some of the athletes who will take part, and look at local efforts toward inclusivity for people with hearing disabilities.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: We look at Self-Defense Forces disaster prep, including their response team's special equipment and techniques, and a new tsunami prediction system.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Shiga Prefecture / Nagayama Yuko (Architect)\nFor 400 years, a group of stonemasons have been building walls using natural stone. Nagayama learns how a stone's qualities are assessed and utilized.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: This episode focuses on words related to fukuro (bag). Reflecting its unique wrapping culture, Japan has a wide variety of bags, leading to an equal variety of Japanese words and expressions.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life
channel.desc: It's late at night, when all are fast asleep. A young man and woman huddle together along the veranda outside of a house, attending to a ... rooster. What could the pair be up to?\n\n*\"Making the Rooster Drunk to Prevent His Crowing at Dawn\" (1767-68) by Suzuki Harunobu.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 15, Day 7 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Neo Japonism
channel.desc: There are nearly 190,000 Japanese-style restaurants around the world and 90 percent are run by non-Japanese chefs. We look at how global cultures and trends are updating Japanese cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Navigating Disasters
channel.desc: In this series we share Japan's disaster preparedness knowledge with viewers around the world. This time we zero in on disasters related to heavy snowfall. As global warming progresses, increasingly heavy snow loads are threatening people's lives. Record-breaking snowstorms have struck far and wide, disrupting city functions and even impacting regions that rarely see that type of weather. Scientists have been working to unravel the mechanisms behind snow disasters and mitigate future risk. Join us as we visit the front lines of disaster prevention and highlight how Japanese people have learned to live with snow.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: J Melo
channel.desc: Join May J. for great Japanese music! This week, three energetic idol groups: 12-member group ?ME, Hello! Project group Angerme, and Cho Tokimeki ? Sendenbu, who just released a new single.\nOn Demand until November 23, 2025.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. \"I want to see my owner again!\" Charo starts his adventure back home.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: *First broadcast on November 16, 2025\nOver 70% of Japanese people are said to use eyeglasses. We visit Sabae, in Fukui, where over 90% of Japan's glasses are made, and explore the history of Japanese eyewear and the latest technology.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: We head to Yashima, where the local boss cat leads us to a temple along the Shikoku Pilgrimage. The temple grounds are home to cats that nap, play, and greet pilgrims and other visitors.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: Many now rarely seen crafts live on in the remote villages of the Kii Mountains. We see aged artisans producing pigment from pine tree soot and crafting traditional wooden buckets and tubs.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The New Adventures Of Rockie And Her Friends
channel.desc: Rockie and her buddies are given an exciting new gadget for talking to strangers far away. But Rockie's conversation with one such stranger leads her to peril.\n\nEducational theme: Distinction between right and wrong.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: U\u0026i
channel.desc: \"i\" is in love with new student \"u,\" and gives him some cookies. She's shocked with his disappointed look and becomes depressed. But \"u\" is allergic to eggs, and is therefore unable to eat cookies.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 15, Day 7 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ramen Japan
channel.desc: What makes these one-of-a-kind handmade noodles so unique?! Come to Sano for a taste you won't find anywhere else.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Crests are symbols of families and organizations. Once the privilege of the imperial and samurai classes, they were adopted by merchants and the populace as marks of pride.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: fielding an urgent request on the phone. Dong Van Huu, from Vietnam, designs blueprints at an architecture company. He first became interested in Japanese architecture as a college student in Vietnam. In 2015, he came to Japan as a technical intern. Now, he works at the company where he formerly interned. His desire to improve means overcoming challenges including unfamiliar terms and detailed measurements. In a roleplay challenge, he deals with an urgent request on the phone about blueprints that are missing key information.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: The whole world loves jeans. But they're also all too often thrown away. Kawahara Takuya upcycles this discarded denim combining different textures and fading to create stylish clothes with a unique sensibility that's seen them grow in popularity. His indispensable partner, Yamasawa Ryoji, buys used jeans from overseas by the ton. Both men are denim devotees who are dedicated to rescuing and reusing what was thrown out, making it cooler than cool again.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Neo Japonism
channel.desc: There are nearly 190,000 Japanese-style restaurants around the world and 90 percent are run by non-Japanese chefs. We look at how global cultures and trends are updating Japanese cuisine.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Live
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN will broadcast GRAND SUMO November Tournament Day 8 action live from Fukuoka, as top wrestlers have their eighth bouts of the 15-day contest.

channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Today: fielding an urgent request on the phone. Dong Van Huu, from Vietnam, designs blueprints at an architecture company. He first became interested in Japanese architecture as a college student in Vietnam. In 2015, he came to Japan as a technical intern. Now, he works at the company where he formerly interned. His desire to improve means overcoming challenges including unfamiliar terms and detailed measurements. In a roleplay challenge, he deals with an urgent request on the phone about blueprints that are missing key information.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Zero Waste Life
channel.desc: The whole world loves jeans. But they're also all too often thrown away. Kawahara Takuya upcycles this discarded denim combining different textures and fading to create stylish clothes with a unique sensibility that's seen them grow in popularity. His indispensable partner, Yamasawa Ryoji, buys used jeans from overseas by the ton. Both men are denim devotees who are dedicated to rescuing and reusing what was thrown out, making it cooler than cool again.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from November 16, Day 8 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Fukuoka.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Sumopedia
channel.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: A monk from Myanmar came to Japan to build a temple for the people of his country. He believes it's his mission to offer them a place of sanctuary and provide them with physical and mental comfort.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Impacts: Climates Change The World
channel.desc: Episode 5 of this series on COP30 in Brazil examines agroforestry, a combination of agriculture and forestry promoted by scientists as a potential method of regenerating rainforests.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Shiga Prefecture / Nagayama Yuko (Architect)\nFor 400 years, a group of stonemasons have been building walls using natural stone. Nagayama learns how a stone's qualities are assessed and utilized.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We meet American Parker Allen, a Tokyo-based consultant who helps foreigners purchase vacant houses in Japan, and Argentinian-born Komatsu Graciela Ana who runs a dairy farm in Shibetsu, Hokkaido.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Japan
channel.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 BC to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: Lacquer.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: We look at Self-Defense Forces disaster prep, including their response team's special equipment and techniques, and a new tsunami prediction system.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. In this episode, poet and literary translator Peter MacMillan travels to Matsue City, Shimane Prefecture, where the writer and journalist Lafcadio Hearn (1850-1904) lived. Hearn is known for his compilation of Japanese ghost stories, Kwaidan, and had a deep interest in Japanese spirituality and folk religion. We visit the places that inspired Hearn in Matsue and look at some expressions related to ghosts along the way.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: Talk about your plans. Put \"shimasu\" after the plan to explain what you are going to do.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: This episode introduces Japan's unique volunteer fire corps composed of local residents who often arrive at a disaster scene before professional firefighters. A Thai reporter visits Sano City.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: A sumo tournament is being held in London for the first time in 34 years. At a screening of Grand Sumo Legends, Wajima: The Golden Left, attendees can learn about NHK WORLD-JAPAN's useful services.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: Totsukawa Village is located on the southern tip of Nara Prefecture in the center of the Kii Peninsula. Most of the village is covered with steep mountains, and the residents live in more than 50 settlements. It is the villagers themselves who are responsible for keeping the traditions and opening up the future of the village. The running of the settlements is thoroughly discussed by everyone involved. This is an autumn story about a village different from any other in Japan.

channel.title: Info

channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.title: Where We Call Home

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Mizushiri Yoriko won the Silver Bear in the short film competition at the 2025 Berlin International Film Festival. She talks about her passion for creating animations that evoke a sense of touch.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk World Selection
channel.desc: A selection of acclaimed programs from NHK's domestic channels dubbed into English.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life
channel.desc: We visit one of the most famous cherry blossom spots in Edo. Flower viewing parties were for eating, drinking and making merry. It was also an opportunity for young men and women to mingle.\n\n*\"Flower Viewing at Mimeguri Shrine\" (1799) by Kitagawa Utamaro.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: Limited mobility can restrict blood flow, causing pressure injuries. To address them, Japanese experts are developing advanced bedding and other technologies.[(96057)]
